ygData.subject: Re: I DROPPED my Mistmoore Drum!!!!  :(
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I understand that Verant is considering this (well, more like a toggle to prevent you from dropping anything, which would be fine with me, since I never
ygData.messageBody:
James Schuldes wrote:
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Makes me think that we should as for a command to allow players to "make"
> items "no drop" on command.
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> <The Pantheon>
> Bard of the 42nd song
> somewhere on Innoruuk

I understand that Verant is considering this (well, more like a toggle to
prevent you from dropping anything, which would be fine with me, since I never
want to put anything on the ground in any case).

On an unrelated note: NO!!!! Sylly is 42!!!! I thought I was finally
catching up!

Kenross Cantoforjado, 40 (and a half) songs, Innoruuk
(who needs another week or two of RL vacation...)
